db_fComment module¶

db_fComment.insert_comment(text, responsible, ticket)¶

Inserts comment in table.

Parameters:
  • text (LongText) – Text of the comment
  • responsible (User) – User who wrote the comment
  • ticket (Ticket) – Ticket that owns the comment
Returns:

Comment object, or None if IntegrityError
db_fComment.get_comment(id)¶

Retrieves comment object from database.

Parameters:id (Integer) – Identifier of the comment to retrieve
Returns:Comment object, or None if DoesNotExist
db_fComment.print_comment(comment)¶

Debug function. Prints comment data (id, date, text, responsible’s username, ticket ID).

Parameters:comment (Comment object) – Comment whose data will be printed
